LanguageData.VPE_PipesNotConnected: Pipes not connected to generator or tanks
LanguageData.VPE_MustPlaceOnGasGeyser: This building must be placed on top of a helixien gas geyser
LanguageData.VPE_RadiationProduced: Warning: Reactor producing radiation in a {0} meters radius
LanguageData.VPE_Meltdown: Warning: Meltdown due to high temperature. Until repaired, reactor will kill all life in a radius of
LanguageData.VPE_MeltdownLetter: A partial reactor meltdown has occured due to high temperature in the reactor room! Until repaired, this reactor will be extremely harmful to life in an extended radius.\n\nIgnoring this may very well be the end of your colony in a few hours.
LanguageData.VPE_NoReactorRoom: Reactor room must be a roofed, enclosed space
LanguageData.VPE_MustPlaceRoofed: This building needs to be placed in an indoors, roofed area
LanguageData.VPE_NotProducing: No souls absorbed. The Machine Gods are hungry for human souls.
LanguageData.VPE_NotLightningProducing: Lightning electricity depleted. Looks like you'll have to wait for the next thunderstorm.
LanguageData.VPE_GasExplosion: A fault in {0} has caused a gas explosion.
LanguageData.VPE_GasExplosionStartedFire: A fault in {0} has caused a gas explosion which started a fire.
LanguageData.VPE_GasExplosionLostGas: All {0} l-d of gas in the connected gas tanks has been discharged in a violent explosion.
LanguageData.VPE_GasExplosionLWasLarge: This large amount of gas has created an explosion of considerable size.
LanguageData.VPE_GasExplosionLWasHuge: That really is a huge explosion. Wow.
